text: Bernd Bransch (24 September 1944 – 11 June 2022) was a German footballer. He was born in Halle, Saxony-Anhalt, East Germany. In 1972, he won an Olympic bronze medal. In 1976, he won a gold medal. He played for the East Germany national football team from 1967 until 1976, making sixty-four appearances. Bransch died on 11 June 2022 at the age of 77.Bernd Bransch ist tot: Halle verliert seinen erfolgreichsten Fußballer ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for East Germany Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany Category:Sportspeople from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Bernd Bransch
